description.value: Play the famous zen tunes in your help desk.
description.title: app description

defaultdescription2.value: This ticket was created on your behalf.
defaultdescription2.title: Default description text part 2

customer_list.value: Choose an existing customer list. You will be creating a proactive ticket for each of these customers.
customer_list.title: Customer list selection instructions

campaign_name.value: Create a unique identifier for this campaign. We’ll automatically tag your ticket with this name so you can report on this campaign.
campaign_name.title: Campaign name instructions

proactive_ticket_fields.value: Fill in your ticket details. If you need help, check out
proactive_ticket_fields.title: Proactive ticket fields instructions

headline.value: A better customer experience starts with proactive support
headline.title: Headline to display under title

subhead.value: With the Proactive Tickets app, you can generate Zendesk tickets on behalf of your customers. Easily create tasks and send follow-up communication to your customers.
subhead.title: Summary statement about proactive ticket app

cta.title: Call to action button to create a campaign

icon1body.value: Go from reactive support to proactive engagement. Make your customer interactions more strategic and future-thinking.
icon1body.title: Body text for icon 1 on tab 1

icon2body.value: Engaging customers with proactive support as soon as problems arise provides them with a better customer experience.
icon2body.title: Body text for icon 2 on tab 1

icon3body.value: Creating proactive tickets provide your support team a more organized way to take charge of your customer conversations.
icon3body.title: Body text for icon 3 on tab 1

question1.value: How will this impact my ticket workflows?
question1.title: First FAQ question

answer1.value: The Proactive Ticket app will not affect your current ticket workflows. The app simply creates new tickets which will follow the existing workflows you have set up.
answer1.title: First FAQ answer

question2.value: Can I customize my proactive ticket workflow?
question2.title: Second FAQ question

answer2.value: Yes! Simply create a trigger for your proactive tickets. Each proactive ticket campaign has a unique tag which you can set as one of your trigger conditions.
answer2.title: Second FAQ answer

question3.value: How do I view and report on proactive tickets?
question3.title: Third FAQ question

answer3.value: The Proactive Tickets app automatically creates a ticket view based on your campaign. You can manage your tickets from that view, as well as create custom reports using Insights.
answer3.title: Third FAQ answer

question4.value: How many proactive tickets can I create?
question4.title: Fourth FAQ question

answer4.value: We recommend creating no more than 1,000 proactive tickets per campaign. Remember to not create more tickets than your team can reasonably support.
answer4.title: Fourth FAQ answer

copy1.value: You are about to create proactive tickets on behalf of
copy1.title: Copy 1 for confirmation page

copy2.value: customers. They will receive an email notification with the below ticket details.
copy2.title: Copy 2 for confirmation page

header.value: Congrats! That’s one giant leap for your customer support.
header.title: Done screen header

supporting_copy.value: Your customers are going to be grateful for the extra care you’re providing. We’ve also went ahead and created a special ticket view so you can easily manage the proactive tickets.
supporting_copy.title: Supporting copy for done screen
